duties_responsibilities.duty: Conceptualize, design, bid, and execute construction projects in collaboration with project staff and subcontract engineering firms.
Manage project financial costing, budget controls, and subcontract management to ensure project contractual requirements are met.
Develop and facilitate the program management plan and customer communication, ensuring compliance with codes, guidelines, and best practices.
Build strong customer relationships, act as a subject-matter expert for all aspects of contract services and obligations.
Prepare periodic progress and cost reports, presentations, and required documentation for contract deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Engineering, or Construction Management (Master's preferred)
